data.title: Order of Quentin Bates Books
data.meta_description: This is the Order of Quentin Bates Books in both chronological order and publication order. List verified daily and newest books added immediately.
data.text:
Quentin Bates is an English novelist of mystery/crime fiction novels. Quentin found himself working in Iceland for a year, which turned into a decade, and has used some of that experience as well as a university writing course to develop his Gunnhildur series. Although he is British, Quentin is more in line with Scandinavian crime fiction authors. Quentin is also a full-time journalist and feature writer for an obscure nautical trade magazine.

Quentin Bates made his fiction debut with the novel Frozen Out (or Frozen Assets) in 2011. Below is a list of Quentin Bates’ books in order of when they were first released:

Get notified when Quentin Bates releases a new book at BookNotification.com.

Publication Order of Officer Gunnhildur Books

Frozen Assets / Frozen Out (2010)Amazon.com | Amazon.deCold Comfort (2012)Amazon.com | Amazon.deWinterlude (2013)Amazon.com | Amazon.deChilled to the Bone (2013)Amazon.com | Amazon.deCold Steal (2014)Amazon.com | Amazon.deSummerchill (2015)Amazon.com | Amazon.deThin Ice (2016)Amazon.com | Amazon.deCold Breath (2018)Amazon.com | Amazon.deCold Malice (2020)Amazon.com | Amazon.de

Publication Order of Non-Fiction Books

Life on the Edge (2001)Amazon.com | Amazon.de

Note: Frozen Out was also published as Frozen Assets.

Quentin Bates Reader Reviews:

Submitted by Karen W.

Just started reading Frozen Assets by Questin Bates. It gripped me right from the start and I can’t wait to finish and get the next one!
